Colombian coffee 24/7, Internet, Wi-Fi in rooms, Safe deposit boxes, Front desk 24/7, Security cameras and buzzer doors for your security, Cablet TV, Luggage storage, Local phone calls, Booking for onward hostels of your choice, Taxi reservations, Bus Reservations, Fully Equipped Kitchen , Tourist information about Bogota and surrounding areas, including information about nightlife, concerts, theatre, etc.

description.description: We introduce a hostel with a family atmosphere, quiet and safe, oriented for family holiday, couples, single travelers and groups seeking an affordable and good quality. Our hostel service is very different from what can be found in the area as we strive to provide a place with excellent conditions of comfort, care and cleaning.
